column4: The SAVE button is greyed out on editing wired connection settings?
i need to set the IP and DNS manually
open a CLI window and "ifconfig eth0 192.168.0.105 netmask 255.255.255.0" ? the ips must match what your router issues via DHCP and must be an IP not in use
the save button is greyed. I can change the settings but not save them
sure makara, so skip configuring it from the GUI and open a command prompt
ok, done. now how to turn it on?
